Package org.sopra.api.command

Interface CommandFactory

public interface CommandFactory
The command factory creates new commands. It implements the so-called "factory pattern". By this pattern a factory simplifies the creation of objects (in this case framework commands) or makes it more secure.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AdjustConsumerCommand createAdjustConsumerCommand​(ControllableConsumer target, int amount)
    Creates a command to adjust a controllable consumer.
    AdjustProducerCommand createAdjustProducerCommand​(ControllableProducer target, int amount)
    Creates a command to adjust a controllable producer.
    BuildPowerPlantCommand createBuildPlantCommand​(PlantLocation target, ProducerType type)
    Creates a command that builds a power plant on a transformer station.
    UpgradeLineCommand createUpgradeLineCommand​(PowerLine target, PowerLineType type)
    Creates a command that upgrades a power line.

  • Method Details

    • createUpgradeLineCommand

      UpgradeLineCommand createUpgradeLineCommand​(PowerLine target, PowerLineType type)
      Creates a command that upgrades a power line.

      ATTENTION: Commads do NOT execute by them self! You have to create it & then execute it!

      Parameters:
      target - Power line which shall be upgraded
      type - Type of power line that the target is changed to
      Returns:
      An UpgradeLineCommand for the target

    • createBuildPlantCommand

      BuildPowerPlantCommand createBuildPlantCommand​(PlantLocation target, ProducerType type)
      Creates a command that builds a power plant on a transformer station.

      ATTENTION: Commads do NOT execute by them self! You have to create it & then execute it!

      Parameters:
      target - Plant location on which the specific power plant shall be built on
      type - Type of power plant to build
      Returns:
      A BuildPlantCommand for the target

    • createAdjustProducerCommand

      AdjustProducerCommand createAdjustProducerCommand​(ControllableProducer target, int amount)
      Creates a command to adjust a controllable producer.

      ATTENTION: Commads do NOT execute by them self! You have to create it & then execute it by your self!

      Parameters:
      target - Controllable producer. Its power production needs adjustment
      amount - Amount of energy by which to adjust the production. A negative amount leads to a decrease in production, a positive amount leads to an increase
      Returns:
      AdjustProducerCommand for the target

    • createAdjustConsumerCommand

      AdjustConsumerCommand createAdjustConsumerCommand​(ControllableConsumer target, int amount)
      Creates a command to adjust a controllable consumer.

      ATTENTION: Commads do NOT execute by them self! You have to create it & then execute it by your self!

      Parameters:
      target - Controllable consumer. Its power consumption needs adjustment
      amount - Amount of energy by which to adjust the consumption. A negative amount leads to a decrease in consumption, a positive amount leads to an increase
      Returns:
      An AdjustConsumerCommand for the target
